lines.text: That drag queen is amazing, huh Billy? He totally looks like a woman.

[to Georgiana]
Ok, I need to know that his penis is large enough to sustain this relationship.

[playing the guitar and singing]
Life's been so empty without one like you. You're gay friend caused some friction, but you don't condem my drug addiction. I want to eat you, I want to taste you, I want to swallow you. She calls herself Georgina.

[cont. singing]
Oh I need her, oh I do. She calls herself Georgina.

[cont. singing]
I need her, I do. I wish I would have met you just a week ago because I smoked something and what it was I just don't know. And now I'm hearing voices and who they are I haven't found and now that you're hear babe you're the voice I want around. I want to eat you, I want to taste you, I want to swallow you.

[cont. singing]
She calls herself Georgina. I want to eat you I do. She calls herself Georgina, what a name that is... I want to meet you.
That was beautiful. Wow. Thank you so much.
Ask me about Andrew and I.
You want coffee? I give you coffee! Here! Drink ze coffee!
[she throws the coffee in his face]
Freak, party of one. Your table is ready.
Girlfriend in San Francisco. What's that supposed to mean?
Nothing. Some of my best friends are...
